items.sentence: He accidentally hit his thumb with the hammer.
He got lost while he was walking in the woods.
He has been playing tennis since this morning.
He has not eaten a decent meal in a long time.
I bet you\'re wondering why Tom left so early.
I can carry that for you if you\'d like me to.
We couldn\'t go out because of the heavy rain.
Why don\'t you just say you don\'t want to go?
Could you recommend an inexpensive restaurant?
Did Tom say why he wanted to borrow the truck?
Did Tom tell you he was having money problems?
Did the doctor give you anything for the pain?
Did we have any English homework due tomorrow?
It was the most boring trip of my entire life.
It was three nights ago that Tom visited Mary.
I\'ll mail these letters on the way to school.
I\'ll never be able to sing as well as you do.
I\'ll only say this once, so listen carefully.
You\'d better keep your money for a rainy day.
You\'d better take an umbrella with you today.
